thread.section_title: SSENSE Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of SSENSE | ssense.com | 5 of 99
thread.title: Amanda L. Conquer
thread.title_full: SSENSE reviewed by Amanda L. Conquer

author: Amanda L. Conquer
title: Amanda L. Conquer
text:
The experience with SSENSE was awesome, the shipping was super fast and I love my new shoes.
I ordered two pairs of the same shoe, in different sizes, and love that free returns were an option. It worked out perfectly as the shoes I ordered ran big so I ended up sizing down and keeping the smaller pair. The return process was super easy and I was shocked the return was processed within a day of sending it back! So awesome.
Additionally, I love that SSENSE is Canadian and will definitely be purchasing from them again!
